Peer-reviewed Journal Publications

  2. Zhang, F., Zhou, Q., Li, Q., Wu, G., & Liu, J. (2017). An enhanced approach for surface flow routing over drainage-constrained triangulated irregular networks. Transactions in GIS, http://doi.org/10.1111/tgis.12294 (Accepted, in press)

  3. Du, S., Zhang, F., & Zhang, X. (2015). Semantic classification of urban buildings combining VHR image and GIS data: An improved random forest approach. ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing, 105, 107–119. http://doi.org/10.1016/j.isprsjprs.2015.03.011

  4. Zhang, F., Du, S., & Guo, Z. (2013). Extracting municipal solid waste dumps based on high resolution images. Spectroscopy and Spectral Analysis, 33(8), 2024–2030. http://doi.org/10.3964/j.issn.1000-0593(2013)08-2024-07 (In Chinese)
